#Text=3. Novel Comparison Laws , Distance and Entropy Measures for PHFLTS
#Text=In this section , we attempt to develop novel comparison laws as well as define a novel distance measure for PHFLTS .
#Text=The entropy measure for PHFLTS is adapted from the previous work by Liu et al. .

#Text=The proofs are similar to those of the distance measure for PHFLTS , and thus they are omitted here .
#Text=The entropy measure is an important tool to express the mathematical values of the fuzziness of PHFLTS .
#Text=We adapt the following entropy measures of PHFLTSs from those defined by Wei et al. for HFLTSs and those defined for probabilistic linguistic term set by Liu et al. .
#Text=Definition 14.
#Text=Let be an LTS , and let be a PHFLTS .
#Text=Then , the entropy measure for PHFLTSs is defined as follows .
#Text=Especially , we adopt the convention .
#Text=Proposition 1.
#Text=The entropy measure defined in Definition 14 satisfies the following properties :
#Text=The proofs of Proposition 1 are similar to those of Wei et al. and Liu et al. and , therefore , are omitted here .
#Text=Furthermore , one can refer to the works of Tian et al. and Gou et al. for more definitions of information measures such as cross-entropy , relative entropy , and hesitant entropy .
#Text=The proposed entropy measure for PHFLTS entails the advantages of superior interpretability and applicability .
#Text=In addition , it preserves the ability to measure the information contained in PHFLTSs and assure the reliability of the derived weights , as discussed in the subsequent section .
